{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT1900AC |revision=S |asin=B014MIBLSA;US; |newegg=9SIAB2753F0077 |price=229.99 |series=AC1900 |est_release_date=10/07/2015 |fcc_date=03/20/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRT1900ACV2 |ic_id=3839A-WRT1900ACV2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6820;88F6820-A0, C160, Armada 385; |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 / eSATA (combo port) |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8864 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip1_model=88W8864 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6172 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 3.0 Host Controller;EtronTech;EJ168A;;1; ,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 2.4GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85201;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5522;;4; ,,, 5GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85601;;4; |flags=no fan |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, LEDE Project |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|AC1900 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Wireless Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-WRT1900ACS/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT1900ACS|pid=01t34000003qSgQAAU}}
[[Linksys WRT1900ACS]] (Shelby) :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820-A0 C160 @1.6GHz (Armada 385) :Flash: 128MB (NAND), RAM: 512MB (DDR3) <!--{{FCC ST|06/30/2015}}--> [[Linksys WRT1900AC v2]] (Cobra) *[http://www.linksys.com/ca/support-article?articleNum=143610 ''Getting to know the Linksys WRT1900AC'' on '''Linksys'''] :[[Linksys WRT1900AC]] v1 (Mamba) - Dual Core @1.2GHz CPU ::CPU: [[Marvell]] MV78230; MV78230-B0 C120 @1.2GHz (Armada XP) :[[Linksys WRT1900AC v2]] (Cobra) - Dual-Core @1.3GHz CPU ::CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820; 88F6820-A0 C133 @1.33GHz (Armada 385) *[http://www.linksys.com/ru/support-article?articleNum=156194 Product comparison between ''Linksys WRT1900AC and WRT1900AC v2''] :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820 C133 @1.33MHz (C160 @1.6GHz FCC images) :Uses a 12V 3A power adapter <small> :According to the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3040357 Description of Change] document at the FCC, the following models :are electrically identical. Different model names are for marketing purposes. *WRT1900ACS, WRT1900ACSV2, WRT1900ACS V2 :The [[Linksys WRT1900AC v2]] should also have identical components but possibly :different cooling setups.</small>
==Additional external links== ===Wikis=== *{{WPLink|Linksys_routers#WRT1900AC}} *[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series#wrt1900acs WRT1900ACS] - [[Marvell]] Armada 385 @1.6GHz (Shelby)
===Notices=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32855-linksys-announces-the-wrt1900acs ''Linksys Announces The WRT1900ACS'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.cnet.com/products/linksys-wrt1900acs-dual-band-gigabit-wi-fi-router/ ''Linksys WRT1900ACS Dual Band Gigabit Router'' on '''C|Net'''] *[http://betanews.com/2015/10/07/linksys-linux-wrt1900acs-router-open-source/ ''Linksys unveils Linux-powered WRT1900ACS router'' on '''BetaNews''']
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32856-linksys-wrt1900acs-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''Linksys WRT1900ACS Gigabit Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.pcworld.com/article/2990486/home-networking/linksys-wrt1900acs-review-the-best-router-for-most-router-enthusiasts.html ''Linksys WRT1900ACS Dual Band Gigabit Router Review'' on '''PCWorld'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32393-linksys-wrt1900ac-ac1900-dual-band-wireless-router-review Review ''Linksys WRT1900AC v1'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ([http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32400-linksys-wrt1900ac-review-more-tests + more tests]) *[https://ipon.eu/elemzesek/linksys_wrt1900ac_a_negyantennas_802.11ac_router/2124/2 Review ''Linksys WRT1900AC'' on '''iPon'''] ([https://ipon.hu/_userfiles/Image/joker/linksys/wrt1900ac/szoftver/marvell01.png MV78230 Spec], PCB images)
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=50173&p=322 ''Update on Linksys WRT1900AC support'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] (Kaloz) :Support for the WRT1900ACS (Shelby) is available in CC and trunk *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/linksys-wrt-1900acs.27516/ ''Linksys WRT1900ACS'' on '''SNB''' forums] (RMerlin)
